text:
Bhuvan Bam – the man needs no introduction. The 24-year-old guy behind BB Ki Vines – a series that rakes in millions of views within hours of a video releasing online – became an internet sensation with his hilarious videos. In September, he became India’s first YouTuber to hit 10 million subscribers.
Remember Bhuvan Bam spoofed a video from the Royal wedding of Meghan Markle and Prince Harry, which broke the internet in no time?
He also had a funny take on Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma’s wedding video. In case you have forgotten about it, watch the video below.
And now that the internet is buzzing with Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone’s wedding pictures and videos, Bhuvan Bam, the Vlogger has come up yet another funny video around Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh’s wedding reception in Bengaluru. Take a look below.
Don't Miss 106 SHARES 5.1 K SHARES 3.9 K SHARES 185 SHARES 468 SHARES
It had us in splits, what about you?
Also Read: Back To Basics! Ranveer Sets The Stage On Fire As He Dances With Deepika In A Quirky Outfit
title: After Virushka & The Royal Wedding, Bhuvan Bam Is Back With A Rib-Tickling Parody On DeepVeer!
description: Remember Bhuvan Bam spoofed a video from the Royal wedding of Meghan Markle and Prince Harry, which went virat minutes after he released it. He also had a funny take on Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma’s wedding video. Now, has come up yet another funny video around Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh’s wedding reception in Bengaluru.
